Whether the service-linked role permission is granted:

- false: Not granted.

schema.description: The page number of the query result, default is 1.
Start time. The format is a Unix timestamp, which is the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970.
End time. The format is a Unix timestamp, which is the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970.

StartTime.description: Start time. The format is a Unix timestamp, which is the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970.

EndTime.description: End time. The format is a Unix timestamp, which is the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970.

Message.description: Return message. When the request is successful, it returns a success message; when the request fails, it returns the reason for the failure.

Success.description:
Request return status.
- true: Success.
- false: Failure.

ValueDisplay.title: 告警事件发生路径
ValueDisplay.description: Path where the alarm event occurred.

Value.title: 告警事件发生路径
Value.description: Path where the alarm event occurred.

ContainHwMode.title: 重保模式
ContainHwMode.description: Whether high-protection mode is enabled. true means enabled, false means not enabled.

AlarmName.title: 告警名称
AlarmName.example: 负载均衡可挂载服务器数量告警

Status.title: 处理状态
Status.example:
要查询的告警事件状态。取值：

0：全部
1：待处理
2：已忽略
4：已确认
8：已标记为误报
16：处理中
32：处理完毕
64：已经过期
128：已经删除
512：自动拦截中
513：自动拦截完毕

Id.title: 工单主键id
Id.description: Primary key ID of the work order.

AnalysisResult.title: 分析过程
AnalysisResult.example: [{"value":"服务器可能已被黑客攻击，存在恶意进程在运行。 分析过程：告警显示，服务端存在一个名为”dns.exe”的进程在访问”polling.burpcollaborator.net”，这是一个被黑名单列出的恶意域名。在正常情况下,”dns.exe”不应该单独存在于系统的路径下，并且也不应该访问这类恶意域名。因此，这个进程可能是黑客留下的恶意进程。","key":"结论"},{"value":"尽快对服务器进行全面扫描，清除恶意进程。同时，联系网络安全专家进行深入调查，以确定是否有其他潜在的安全威胁。","key":"处置建议"}]

Message.description: Return message.

Success.description: Whether the operation was successful: - true: Success. - false: Failure.

schema.title: 是否已处理；y:已处理；n:未处理
schema.description: Whether it has been processed; y: processed; n: not processed

schema.title: 要查询漏洞的资产信息，可以设置为资产名称、公网IP或私网IP。
schema.description: Asset information of the vulnerability to be queried, which can be set as asset name, public IP, or private IP.

schema.title: 要查询漏洞的服务器的UUID，多个UUID之间使用半角逗号（,）分隔
schema.description: UUID of the server with the vulnerability to be queried. Multiple UUIDs should be separated by a comma (,).

PageSize.description: Number of items per page in the returned data.

TotalCount.description: Total number of records in the query result.

Status.title: 漏洞状态
Status.description:
Vulnerability status:
1: Not fixed
2: Fix failed
3: Rollback failed
4: Fixing
5: Rolling back
6: Verifying
7: Fixed successfully
8: Fixed successfully, pending reboot
9: Rolled back successfully
10: Ignored
11: Rolled back successfully, pending reboot
12: Vulnerability does not exist
20: Expired

Related.title: 漏洞关联的CVE列表，有多个取值时用半角逗号（,）分隔
Related.description: List of associated CVEs for the vulnerability, separated by commas (,) if there are multiple values.

LastTs.title: 最后发现漏洞的时间戳
LastTs.description: Timestamp of the last time the vulnerability was detected

FirstTs.title: 首次发现漏洞的时间戳
FirstTs.description: Timestamp of the first time the vulnerability was detected
